this_title: キユミの桃子 サユルの涼花
introduction: Momoko and Ryoka have appeared in the KIYUMI & SAYURU series together since childhood. Although hearing that they would be filming a picnic scene underneath cherry blossoms, but come to sit in the strong cold wind. An experimental short done with a fixed camera and a single shot.
chinese_title: キユミの桃子 サユルの涼花
